title: We need more skins for underplayed people
body:
The beautiful man thing ,{{champion:6}} , needs a few new skins, stop with all the {{champion:11}} , {{champion:1}} , and {{champion:17}}  skins. Give the underplayed champs skins, such as {{champion:6}} , and {{champion:57}} . I saw a discussion about  Star guardian/Battle bunny Urgot. And to see that would be amazing, maybe even Magician Urgot. He shoots magic wands or bunnies!

Thanks for reading, PenguFiles

replies.body: I mained bard for the longest time, and pool party bard would make me complete
Ikr!  Who wouldn't want to ride the 'Magical Journey' water slide????
So, we have the 'Magical journey' as a water slide, maybe the passive be water baloons, and tempered fate is a pool. Cosmic bind, and caretaker shrine are still a work in progress.

**Bardtender.
**

His instrument can be a Wine bottle or similar.

Passive: Shot glasses

Q: Splash of alcohol.

W: Martini glass that fills up. Gets a skewered olive when fully charged.

E: Add some fitting color scheme, put an animated neon sign above the entrance.

R: Everyone caught in it sways/stumbles drunkenly.
{{champion:60}}  Hoping since she was played like crazy at championship she will get more skins. She only has two and a third one if you hit gold in season three.
